website_summaries.verdict: A compact, 400W heater for  the space-challenged home or desk area. Fits perfectly in a corner or on the floor to warm up chilly toes.
pros: Provides plenty of warmth despite its small size
Features tipping and overheating protection for your safety
It's also energy-efficient and very easy to transport thanks to its miniature design
cons: Handful of users complained of an unpleasant burning plastic smell upon first use
Though the heater says it features a cool-to-touch exterior, some report that it gets quite hot

website_summaries.verdict: You wouldn't want to attempt to heat a good-sized room with this heater, but as a little personal space heater it is unmatched, particularly for the price.
pros: Has built-in overheat and tip-over protection
Puts out a lot of heat for its size
cons: A little on the loud side, particularly given its size
Some reports of this option dying fairly quickly (within weeks)
Other buyers felt that it didn't put out enough heat

customer_reviews.title: I like to violate fire code by having this under my ...
customer_reviews.text: My office likes to violate OSHA guidelines by keeping it 63 degrees every day. I like to violate fire code by having this under my desk. Keeps my feet and legs warm!
customer_reviews.author: Tanne

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, good amount of heat, safe
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my work in Florida (!!) because we have no control over AC temp and it's freezing in here, no matter how many times we have maintenance come in (way to save the environment...) This heater was a very nice addition. Pros: - small, very easy to transport - reliable - good amount of heat - overheat protection - tipping over protection - quiet - great price Cons: - none so far, will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: My Personal Bubble Heater
customer_reviews.text: It's so adorable! Perfect for just my personal space, my bubble, without getting everyone else in the office warm. If you are looking for something to warm up a room this probably won't do it, however I sit it on my desk at work to warm my hands and arms cause it's like negative degrees in my office area. It doesn't have any heat settings you can change the temp on it or the speed, it just has an off and on button. However if it tips over it automatically turns off which I think is pretty cool. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an elderly family member to replace an old heater in a tiny bathroom, and it works perfectly. The bright color makes it easy to see and it's nicely compact so you won't knock into it. However, it pushes out an intense heat just where needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this little heater for our master bathroom to warm the air when taking a shower. Our bathrooms are at the end of the house furthest from the furnace, so it's always a few degrees colder. It's inexpensive and great for our purpose. Puts out a lot of heat for such a tiny heater. We're happy with this little heater.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Burned up.
customer_reviews.text: Had this Lil guy running for a few weeks at work and home and it has a very plasticy smell that never really went away. It put out good heat when it worked but then it melted down while I was taking a short nap. It has no overheat sensor, only a cheap microswitch on the bottom to detect tips. Would not recommend to anyone. I have used a similar product called a myheat and that was a little less heat output but also didn't smoke me out and almost burn my house down.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Henchman

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one for our camper. First one didn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for our camper. First one didn't work. Sent it back. Second one arrived. Also doesn't work. We have tried every conceivable troubleshooting solution. 2 out of two didn't even turn on. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great little heater. Fairly quiet. I was surprised how much heat comes from 400 watts. It is small and has the safety feature for tipping over. Cons: Stinks. I have been running this for over 3 days trying to get rid of a chemical smell, but it does not seem to be getting better. I'll give it another week, but if it still smells after that, I'm sending it back. Not sure what is causing it and why after this long it is still so overwhelming. I hope it doesnt give me cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny76

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD! Horrible product! Electrical burning smell since the first use.
customer_reviews.text: FIRE HAZARD! Horrible product! Electrical burning smell since the first use. The item appears to have been opened before, I guess this was returned before, and then, sold again without fixing it. The electrical burning smell was overwhelming since it's first use. I returned the item, so DO NOT BUY IT, because if you do, you could get the same one too.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: so far i like it!
customer_reviews.text: so far i like this heater. i bought it to heat the inside of my small RV trailer (16ft), when i'm on shore power (to avoid using the propane furnace). compact size and relatively low wattage is great, and the orange color is easily visible. has an auto shut-off in case it gets tipped over which is also good. i'm making up for no thermostat by buying a thermo controlled ac outlet to plug it into. likely i'll get a better quality thermostat this way than if it came with one. doesn't get too hot to touch, and fan noise isn't an issue. time will tell how long this will last, but so far i like it!
customer_reviews.author: slackerchef

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I've had it only a few weeks now but it does the job. I have a small full bathroom without vents in it so it's always too cold after showers in the winter. This heater is perfect for it! Very compact too so it doesn't take up space.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Have to get close to it in order to feel the warmth.
customer_reviews.text: Warms your toes, but I really wanted it for my bathroom. I left it on while I took a shower and the bathroom wasnt as warm as I wanted it, but I had to get close to it in order to feel the warmth. Ok product
customer_reviews.author: Miami Girl

customer_reviews.title: It works in my bird habitat
customer_reviews.text: I installed this Brightown Mini Desk Heater in an 84-cubic-foot indoor bird habitat to keep it from going below 70 degrees in our 60-degree basement during the winter. It's marginally adequate for that. I wouldn't count on it to heat a bigger space, but it does what I needed it to do. I have it connected to a separate thermostat, so that it runs only about half of the time. And so far, it's been very reliable through two winters.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kopke

customer_reviews.title: Gives off terrible plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: Heater is nice and compact just what i was looking for but could not get rid of the terrible plastic smell that came out of it every time the heat was on. It was very unhealthy the breath in the toxic plastic fumes even for the short periods i had the unit on.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Acker

customer_reviews.title: I love it, except there is no dial to turn it down or up
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little thing. It is super small. Like, you literally can stash it in your back and it weighs nothing at all. It is absolutely perfect for my tiny cubicle. The only thing is that you can't turn it up or down. It was a little too warm and i would rather be able to adjust it rather than it getting too hot for me. The other minor thing is there is a sound. It isn't too loud but it is a little noticeable when you don't want anyone walking past, hearing a faint sound. Other than that I do enjoy it. I'll see as time progresses just how much I actually love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater! Doesn't blow fuses
customer_reviews.text: I live in an old drafty apt., with a not-great heating system that I can't control. Also, limited electricity; fuses blow easily. Yesterday was a super-cold day with high NW winds, which are the worst for my apt. So I used this for the first time to supplement the heat in my small bedroom. It has a nice output, substantially better than the 250 watt personal heater I have. The casing and cord stay cool, and it automatically shuts off when moving it (and then goes back on when stable). This is a PERSONAL heater that has limited output, but again it is super helpful for me, because I can't run stronger heaters without risk of blowing fuses.
customer_reviews.author: SociologyReader

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than dangerous red hot wire heaters!!! These things are pretty darn safe. The temperatures in these are very low compared with tungsten wire or ceramic quartz heaters. But they really do heat just as well. My only complaint is they do have a pretty heavy long term hot plastic smell... It would have been trivial to put a rectifier and three way switch in to make them 200/400 watt selective which I would really like. I might "work in mine" there ;)
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: If at first you don't succeed...
customer_reviews.text: My first review: "I used this little heater for just one hour a day for six days, and then it simply stopped working. Wouldn't turn on. Clearly an unreliable, inferior product -- even though it is the right size for a small room." Updated review: The vendor reached out to me after reading my review above, and offered me a replacement unit for no additional charge. It arrived, as promised. And it has worked every day...so far, so good. If this continues to work, I shall be satisfied. It meets the purpose I had in buying it -- heating a small space in a relatively short time.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste. Just go to Walmart and spend $10 on ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few days. Stopped turning on. Huge waste. Just go to Walmart and spend $10 on a heater with triple the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little heater and excellent wattage for the price! I put it under my desk and sometimes it even gets too hot so I need to move it away. No heat setting - only on or off. It also doesn't work well to heat a large room. I would only recommend this for a small area, such as a desk. I only wish it had a timer, but that is easily remedied by buying a separate timer. I have left this running for 24hrs (OOPS!), and nothing bad has happened, but I cannot recommend doing that!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Decent heater for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Eh...I should’ve realized 400 W would not do the trick, even in a small space and you pretty much have to be directly in front of this thing like other reviewers say,plus It’s only one button FYI on/off,it’s actually OK on the floor by your feet though, I should’ve spent more money for a 700- 1500 W osculating fan but i digress.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey G.

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater
customer_reviews.text: Got this to knock the chill off in my bedroom and it does the job. Don't expect this little heater to heat a whole house. Some might think it is loud but I don't find it that loud but I do like a little white noise while sleeping anyways. If you do use in bedroom just be sure to keep it away from things and you will also will want to cover the red LED as it is quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: I love how quiet this is
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small, quiet space heater for underneath my desk at my office. We're not supposed to have them at all, so while I am not crazy about the bright orange color, I love how quiet this is. Even when it's on, I can't hear it, which means no one else can, either. It only has one setting (on or off), but it's very warm and heats up nicely when placed right at my feet. I like that there's a safety toggle on the bottom that automatically switches the heater off if it loses contact with the ground. I'd purchase again and recommend for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Alli214

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office which gets extremely cold. We're technically not allowed to have space heaters, my current space heater was causing power outages and drew unneeded attention. This smaller wattage one does the trick NOT tripping the power, yet still packing a decent punch to keep my feet warm. I love the neat trick that it has for tipping.
customer_reviews.author: ChantelMurda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Heater for My Office
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little heater for my office in winter months! Because it’s only 400 watts, I feel comfortable to run it on the floor near my feet without feeling overheating. I took on star off on the temp control because the switch is at the back of the unit. Wish it is on the front or top of the unit for easy access. Overall, I recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: nicyyz

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small, low output heater. It is a nice small size. It puts out a lot of heat. It's simple. All very positive. The reason I give it only 3 stars is the smell. It has the toxic chlorinated hydrocarbon solvent / toxic rubber smell that so many Chinese products have these days. It gives me a headache. I'm sure it's poisonous. I'm just hoping that it fades with time.
customer_reviews.author: MudCamper

customer_reviews.title: I loved using this lil heater when I was deployed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it while I was deployed and I was staying in a tent and during the winter it got pretty chilly. My bed and living area was blanketed off but even then, the heat output wasn't the greatest in a small but open area. I had to leave a little opening for my bed (which was blanketed off) to trap the heat inside. Overall this is good for heating small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater at an amazing price, and uses so little electricity.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bedroom about 7 foot by 10. I could not believe how well this tiny little heater got it warm and toasty. I actually had to turn it off a few times as my room was getting too warm. There was a slight electrical odor when I first turned it on, but that has gone away the more I use it. It’s the most incredible little heater I have ever purchased. I really love this little heater,
customer_reviews.author: Spudley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for chilly fingers, but nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of heat but in a very specifc area with fast heat decay. Like will burn your Hands if too close. I had it for my desk and it would be as hot as mentioned above, but would keep my keyboard cool, only like 4 inches below my on fire hands - which was nice. This device will boot keep your whole room or body warm, but is good for a small on desk option for chilly fingers.
customer_reviews.author: TDE_RVA

customer_reviews.title: Two is better than one!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent heaters!!! This is the second one I bought, to use with the first, I had to get another after seeing how awesome the first was!!! Very safe!!! Easy to clean....vacumm hose to the screen for dust every few weeks, simply wipe down the rest of it. Lots of heat. Turns off automatically when tipped. Very safe!!! A lot of bang for your buck!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LoraLee B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for bedrooms. Stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Made my whole house smell like plastic for three days, After using it for two hours. Even ran it in the garage to burn off some smell but it didnt make a difference. We were using it to warm the guest room but itbonky warms like two foot radius around it. Booo.
customer_reviews.author: R and J P

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this little heater. I’ve used it several times. It heats just enough to keep my feet and legs warm. I’ve used it outside and inside. It helped both places. The tip over feature works great - I’ve tipped it a few times and it shuts off. There is no temp control - just on/off. I’ve kept it on for a few hours with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A

customer_reviews.title: I'm the envy of my cold coworkers.
customer_reviews.text: Heating at work is hit or miss and our offices don't have ducts. So, if you keep your door closed, you freeze in all seasons. Rather than wear a coat, I bought this based on reviews. It's a little powerhouse! My feet are warm,my body isn't frozen, and if you kick it over, it automatically shuts off. I might have to put a tracking device on it since there's a fair number of people eyeing it up. A slight smell in the beginning, but it goes away quickly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Appliance Queen

customer_reviews.title: A nice, compact heater
customer_reviews.text: I've had this heater for just under 2 weeks. It is very compact, yet puts out a good amount of heat. I keep it behind my office chair facing my legs and it provides just the right amount of heat. My sound meter shows 41-42 decibels at ear height (about 3 feet right above the heater). So it's not silent, but it is quiet. Power switch is on the back on the right side, so for some people that might be inconvenient, but it works for me. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Taggart Gorman

customer_reviews.title: *Updated Review* Completely stopped working after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It's compact so it's great for an office desk, but in terms of heat...I'm not sure how I feel about its capabilities. It almost feels like the hot air blows on you but then goes away for a few seconds --- Updated review The heater has completely stopped working - when it's plugged in and turned on there's a burning odor.
customer_reviews.author: Reema

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little heater
customer_reviews.text: No point in adding a picture, it looks just like it is advertised. I use it to warm up the bathroom on the rare occasions that it is chilly enough here to warrant it. My only complaint is the location of the on/off switch -- it is on the back of course, which is fine, but at the bottom of the back; no big deal, but it would have been much more convenient toward the top of the back or, even, on top of the heater. However, it does the job it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: V. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: small heater
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I ordered this little heater and it satisfied me that it was a good one. However, it did not heat my small bathroom. The bathroom is very small, but the heater was not at all adequate. I could not feel heat coming out of it. I put it back in the box and it is in my closed. I can not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Bender

customer_reviews.title: Honda EU1000i generator easily powers it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great when I go out bear hunting & I stay in the back of my pickup in my canopy in the wintertime. This heater is easily powered with my Honda EU1000i generator, and it'll still have juice left over to power my CPAP machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little heater for my desk. Makes very little sound but you can hear a light humming if the office is quiet. Any time I've tipped it over, it stops immediately. Love it. No more shivering in the cold office. Wont heat a big area but small and inconspicuous for a desk or cubicle. No heat control, just on/off but that's fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: purplecurves

customer_reviews.title: Great for my mini-camper during winter
customer_reviews.text: Great for my mini-camper during winter. The generator I bought is 1000W startingn and about 800 W running. This will work perfectly during winter camping. I tried this out in my office for a couple of days. It keeps my office up nicely -- this is with the door open.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyPig

customer_reviews.title: Toasty breasts.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a freezing hospital as a nurse. The break room is also freezing. I have an infant at home so every 4 hours I must pump in that freezing room. I would dread having to whip out my breasts in that meat locker. This has been a game changer for my frozen little breasts. This gives off an incredible amount of toasty warmth. My breasts are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: michael aboagye

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office which often too cold for me. It's tiny and works very well. I've only had it a few days, but so far so it's an excellent personal space heater. As far as I can see there's only on or off, so I control the heat by placing it closer or farther from me as needed. I've been way more comfortable working at my desk since this heater arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Salzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini-heater but emits a mean looking little red light when it's operating.
customer_reviews.text: I like this little heater. It's not too strong but strong enough to feel by your bedside at night. The only drawback is that when I'm sleeping, all I see is that little red light to show that it's on. It's downright scary looking when all the other lights are off in my room. All I see is this little devilish red light, as shown in my picture. Other than that it works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: But does work great for heating up your feet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I wanted to believe in this little heater but it has let me down. I have a small office and does not heat up the room. Even if I put it on my desk I cannot get warm. I almost have to have it right up against my skin to feel warm. It did dry my socks when when my shoes got soaked from the rain but does not serve it's function for what I need... it does work great for heating up your feet .
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Warms my 2x4x6.5 grow tent beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this space heater to warm my outdoor grow tent. It’s plugged into a thermostat outlet to keep the tent at an optimal temperature, and this little thing achieves that no problem! Even with a 4” exhaust fan and passive fresh (cold!) intake, my temps never drop below the 68* I have programmed. The anti tip-over mechanism is literally just a switch on the bottom of heater, which is cool. Seems pretty well built and doesn’t give off any funky smells after the first use. I’d recommend this to anyone that needs to heat a small space very efficiently!
customer_reviews.author: Vance Barber

customer_reviews.title: wonderful unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my aunt, and she loves it. She carries it around the house, every time she moves to a new room. The reason I gave it a four star because it does feel "cheap" the outside product, but so far, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small office!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office at work. It’s very compact and easily fits any place in my office! It gives off good heat! When I have my office door shut it all day it does make the room toasty warm too! I can have it on for 7+ hours and it’s never overheated! I also love the safety feature, it’s nice knowing that if it gets knocked over it automatically goes off! I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heater for small office
customer_reviews.text: This little heater was exactly what I was looking for to keep my space warm in the winter. It's super quiet which is helpful in an office setting and it's small enough to fit under my desk. It just has the on/off switch and continually runs unless it's tipped over. I've had it for about a month and had zero problems. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small easy to use heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small heater and easy to use just plug it in and turn on/off button. The heat out put is good, but I noticed after 30 minutes the temp dropped a little, but after few more minutes it was back to warm. If you are looking to control the temp. this unit isn’t for you as there is only an on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: tunwewec

customer_reviews.title: Noise is slightly louder than a bedside fan and great heat output for the immediate area.
customer_reviews.text: I use it under my desk at my home office. I use non-noise canceling over-ear headphones while at my desk and even with nothing playing you can just barely hear the hum. To me, the sound is slightly louder than a bedside fan. Does not greatly impact the overall temperature of the room but it’s great at heating the immediate area. Overall it provides a nice toasty feeling. (Update: been using this thing for over 4 months and it's still ticking.)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing personal heater
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in the cold and my manager said I can bring a small personal heater to keep warm. This heater works perfectly. Constant heat, easy switch on and switch off feature. Also has a safety button feature, the heater turns off if u pick it up or knock it over etc. on the bottom on the heater is a button that gets push by the pressure when it sits up right. So when it falls over etc the button is released and the heater turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You need to be directly in front of it to feel the heat
customer_reviews.text: This little heater is good for what it is. Small size, perfect for on a desk at work. I got this when my office felt like 65 degrees (F) in the fall and my hands were freezing. However, despite putting out decently hot air, even if I had it right in front of my keyboard, the hot air dissipated if you were more than 4-6 inches away. I work in a cubicle, and it definitely did not hear even the area around where I had it. If you could have it pointed right at you, and you could be directly in front of it, you will feel the warmth. Outside of that, it won't warm you up unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for desk area
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly on a desk top or underneath a desk and doesn't effect coworkers that work beside me -which is exactly what I needed. This will not work for any other area. It will release a plastic chemical smell the first day, but once that burns off it's fine. Update: My co-worker loved mine and is also always cold, so I bought her one for her Bday and she's stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple to use, but moderately low power.
customer_reviews.text: No temperature control, so if it’s plugged in, it’s on. It has a safety switch in the bottom so it will shut off if it gets knocked over. It doesn’t put out a lot of heat, but then again, it’s only 400 watts. I bought it to put in the bilge of my boat, but I need something with higher wattage. Might make a good under-desk heater to keep your toes warm.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty weak.
customer_reviews.text: If you are not standing within 3 feet of this you will be little benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best little heater ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought two.. one for home and one for the office. It's super hot, safe and doesn't overheat. I think it's around $18 with free shipping. If you have cold hands at work, this is a great desk top heater.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this little heater. It is just right for putting in a small desk area if you need additional warmth while working. I got it for work. It is also light and easy to carry anywhere with you. I love the amount of heat it puts out to and the safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ann Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my office warm
customer_reviews.text: Very good little desktop heater. It keeps my office nice and toasty. If knocked over it shuts off to prevent a fire which is amazing. Great price. Very easy to set the temperature you need or want it at
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & Desiree

customer_reviews.title: 400-Watt, exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our med/small size room. Very quiet, not drawing too much power, we could keep it on all night and the room would stay in a comfortable temperature in a cold temperature night! Got two in our home and they both have been working well! 10/10 would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good buy -
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellent while it lasted. Unfortunately the internal fan broke and now it wobbles. So it became unusable
customer_reviews.author: Perrins

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for 1 day, brought to work to put under my desk. Ran for about 2 hours and then made a loud POP noise that made me and my coworkers jump... then it smelled like it was burning. I quickly unplugged and put it outside. I don't know what would have happened if I wasn't right there when it broke... I would have been fearful of a fire. Hard pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: JKRed

customer_reviews.title: not much heat
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this in a small bathroom. Didn't put out enough heat. Be aware that this is a SMALL heater. Might work fine as a foot warmer under your office desk. Otherwise not so good
customer_reviews.author: kijjik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my cubicle (one for my hands and 1 for my feet) but the one by my feet works so well that I returned the 2nd one. The temp it puts out is perfect. I keep it under my desk. Not too hot. I keep my feet about 12 inches away from it and it’s perfect. I leave it on for my 8 hour shift and it doesn’t over heat. I can easily touch the sides to turn it to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybles

customer_reviews.title: No temp control on this guy, on or off....
customer_reviews.text: Got this little guy because my office is an arctic tundra. It does the job well enough, but I wish it was just a touch larger. Still giving 5 stars for this item as it does what it says it will and turns off when you kick it over! Safety first folks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive, very small, works well in my office so I bought a second one for a coworker. Good for 1 person, not to warm a room unless it’s a small room and running all day. If you accidentally knock it over it turns off so you can always have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work because they like to freeze people. It is small enough to fit under my desk. It does make noise but it is not too loud that it is bothersome. It kind of blends in with the other noise. I do like how it shuts off when it is tipped over. The only thing I wish there was a timer and heat setting that you can control.
customer_reviews.author: brieson

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: For my room, it heats it up very slowly, but doesn't make the room uncomfortably hot. For such a small heater, I love it. Close the door and let it go for about 30 minutes and the room is at a comfortable temperature. Great little heater!
customer_reviews.author: Keiko G.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly tiny-but cute and quiet
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I was very disappointed by how small it was. But it is so cute, I kept it, and use it to keep the air under my desk at work warm for my feet. Unfortunately, it really is not powerful enough to do much more than that; on the plus side, it is silent, and the automatic turn-off should any tip over occur is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Heat... To Your Face
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hand warmer for my desk at work... In order for it not to burn the table (I suppose this is the reason), it just shoots the air straight out into my face. I have to lift my hands in front of the device to defrost which is unfortunate. It works better as just a regular heater aimed at your back from afar
customer_reviews.author: Jenna the Human

customer_reviews.title: Working perfect in an office in 20 f weather
customer_reviews.text: This little heater is perfect for my 8'x10' office. I plop it right under my desk and it safely heats the area. I have knocked it over at least 15 times and everytime it has acted accordingly and shut off. I love this. If I shut the office door it will warm up the room quite nicely. Only thing is I wish it had a thermostat but when I need it cooler I just shut it off for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even start working.
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged it an and turned it on and it immediately fizzled out. I returned this. No more cheap appliances for me.
customer_reviews.author: roseyfran

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 10 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: It seemed quite convenient thing if only it worked. The heating aspect stopped working in ten days with only the fan part working. I tried contacting the company but got no response from them.
customer_reviews.author: Smriti

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is the perfect size and shape. Honestly it's so warm that my feet sometimes look red if I have it on for too long. I work in a hotel at night and when the front door is open, I am freezing! This is heater was the answer to my problems. I even bought another for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie Baxter-Ivey

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my office and i love it! gives off great heat. and i love the automatic shut off if the unit falls over. the bright color helps to remind me to hide it when i leave the office (these are outlawed in our building). i do wish it had a low/medium/high setting - but if it's feeling too hot, i just move it a little further away from me and that solves the problem. would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great safety at a short range
customer_reviews.text: Safety features are the best part of this heater. With a button on the bottom that must be held, the heater will turn itself off if knocked over. I consider it safe enough to put on a bed. The small size is sufficient for close range, but is expected to take at least an hour to heat a small room. For such low wattage, it doesn't require much care with which other electronics are in use, as my previous heater would trigger breakers and cut power.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: ... (keeping my feet warm under my desk) and I love the orange color
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bill for what I need (keeping my feet warm under my desk) and I love the orange color. Not quite as quiet as I'd like (I was hoping for nearly silent), but it's not bad. I'm not sure why some of the questions refer to "two speeds" - mine only has one.
customer_reviews.author: WednesdayGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desktop heater
customer_reviews.text: I have a field job and my office is an unheated outbuilding. I plugged in this little heater, put it right on my desk, turned the switch on, and relished in the warmth. It’s EXACTLY what I wanted. Very pleased! Other reviews talked about how it only heats up what it’s pointed at and that’s true. Lucky for me, I’m the only thing I wanted heated (not the entire room).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and warm
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't pull a whole lot of power and is perfect for underneath my desk at work. However since it is so small if you're not within a good foot or two you can't feel the heat. Still for the price and size you can't beat it. Definitely recommend for office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable "Little engine that could"
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this heats up my 400-ft space, as long as I have it on all day. The low energy use is a BIG plus for people trying to control their electricity costs. The tipover protection is all I need for this cool-to-the-touch appliancve.
customer_reviews.author: Montague Catway

customer_reviews.title: Cheap heater - does pretty good job
customer_reviews.text: I se this in RV when I don't want to turn on propane heat - does pretty good job for as little as it is. Wouldn't leave it on when away, not that sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Tajsultani

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: It's decent, but not what i asked for. This shouldn't have popped up under "cordless tent heater". There was a list of "battery powered" etc heaters & the pics for this don't include a plug which was definitely misleading. I chose it cause it's small & the cheapest option, but not what i asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Menifee Jr

customer_reviews.title: Little engine that could. LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: It's just an on and off switch. You cannot control how hard it blows or the heat. Although, you really don't need to! It's a really good value for your money and does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Khristina

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. Furnace was out and we were heating the house ok with the wood stove but needed a little extra in the spare room where our seedlings were growing. This thing heated up a 10x10 room with no problem, actually had to remember to switch it off from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: AdamPA

customer_reviews.title: Really warm for a room
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I honestly have mostly used it to keep my room roughly 75° or higher since I need it for my snake. It does an amazing job. I’ve had this thing plugged in for like 3 days straight and no issues thus far. Too lazy to measure but the measurements of the room are about 12x12 so it covers a decent size area
customer_reviews.author: Victor Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great work Heater
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my Locker for those really cold days and this works really well, I have only used it a couple times but it paid for itself then
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a small space
customer_reviews.text: This does not throw much heat. It is cute and small and quiet. Good for my small office. My older heater generated more heat so this one takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Doll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space heating!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater for work as my office likes the AC on high. I love it. It is perfect for under my desk and keeps me warm. I love that it turns off when "knocked over" so I don't always have to bend over to turn it off during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: An adorable little heater that keeps the bathroom warm enough in the morning so I don't have to turn on the central heater.
customer_reviews.author: makatma

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cold office
customer_reviews.text: My office seems to run at 55 all year, this keeps my cubicle warm regardless and has a great little feature where the heater must be standing to remain on. If it gets knocked over, or you pick it up, the button becomes disengaged and the unit turns off. Worked so well, I bought a second one for my mother as a stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a large space.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office at work. My office is roughly 10 feet x10 feet. I run it almost nonstop during the day with the door closed yet it doesn’t noticeably heat up the room. (For comparison I have a different heater at home that will warm up a much larger room) If I aim it directly at me it provides some warmth. Also there is a very short distance from the heater which you are able to feel the heat. I do like the size of it for a small desk heater.
customer_reviews.author: irishJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for igloo offices
customer_reviews.text: My office is FREEZING and this lil heater has been a life saver. I used to wrap my coat around my legs, but now I just use this. Even my coworker likes it because he gets warm by his desk too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a bigger and more powerful one
customer_reviews.text: Works well for its size! I usally put this under my desk and it's very very warm! It even slightly heats up the entire bedroom so it gets slightly warmer than the livingroom. If you want something to heat up the entire bedroom, I recommend a bigger and more powerful one.
customer_reviews.author: Haneul Choi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday in my office! I LOVE it! Wish the color wasn’t orange but hey for the price it was a steal! Update broke not even a year.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: Low wattage but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Keeps my office cozy and didn’t trip the circuit breakers like higher wattage heater did! Smell was very minor with 1st usage and it’s really quiet. Low profile so doesn’t tip over easily and I like the auto off feature if it should accidentally tip over
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly

customer_reviews.title: Only had it 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 2 days of use (2 shifts) used it at work, as it is freezing in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineLady

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect heater for someone using it in a small space or office space. I like the safety features (tip-over protection) and it is very quiet. Sometimes it has a slight burning smell when I first turn it on, but it goes away quickly. This heater has no heat settings or temperature control but it works well if you're looking for a simple and cheap heater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: Sound very tolerable, output is awesome, can heat a whole room 10 by 6 feet (I did ) and when the cats knock it over, that's it. It is safely off. I love this thing
customer_reviews.author: meggerscat

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: needed for my ice box of a office and people love it so much they huddle by it for warmth lol. someone else already ordered hers and another person is ordering one next week! haha
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Orange! Great little heater.
customer_reviews.text: This little heater does pack a punch. My office must be colder and draftier than other reviewers. While the heater is quiet and does put out a nice amount of heat, I would opt for a rotating desk heater. The heat is focused a few feet in front but the other parts of me not near the heater remain cold. I recommend this heater for a cool, draftless office building. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaAPW

customer_reviews.title: Best ceramic heater at 400 watts
customer_reviews.text: I have no heat in my mobile home. I was very surprised to find out how much heat this little personal heater put out. This heater, unlike other heaters advertised on Amazon, has a safety switch that shuts of heater if it tipped over. Best design and color for a personal heater. Best $18.95 ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lane

product_meta.title: Brightown Mini Desk Heater, 400W Low Wattage Personal Ceramic Heater with Tip-Over Protection for Office Table Indoors, Compact, Orange
feature_bullets: 【Easy to Use】Single On/Off switch on the back of office heater. Minor glow from power light is red to let you know the unit is on. The cord is 5 1/2 feet long with 2 prong connection. For indoor personal use such as office desk table tent camping desktop

【Low Wattage】400W, 110V, 3.63 amps. Low wattage heater is more economical than running a higher wattage space heater and will not overload the circuit. Great choice for people who live in a mild climate

【Quiet & Fast Heating】Puts out a pretty decent amount of heat, suggest using it for space about 100sq.Ft. Use it by the desk, take the chill off a small, cool office space. Use it at home when you don’t want to heat up the entire house with other centralized heaters. It's very quiet so it won't keep you awake at night

【Bright & Compact】6.3"x3.15"x 6.3" Bright orange color makes it easy to see and it's nicely compact so you won't knock into it. This personal space heater doesn't take up much space and portable that moving it from room to room is a breeze

【Safe & Warranty】ETL listed desktop heater made of flame retardant material, will shut off automatically if you happen to tip it over, which is a nice safety feature, especially around the lot of papers on the desktop. Outer surface stays cool. Manufacturer warranty for 1-Year from date of purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,292 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
